why-did-you-apply-inside.required: Select the reason you applied for a visa

why-did-you-apply-outside.required: Select the reason you applied for a visa

identity-verification-date.required: Enter the date you provided your biometrics
identity-verification-date.date: You must enter a real date
identity-verification-date.before: The date cannot be in the future
identity-verification-date.after: The date you enter must not be more than 12 months in the past
